html: The glory—Of his own kindred and family, who shall all depend upon him, and receive glory from him; of the house of David, which is called his father's house, because he was of the blood—royal. The offspring—Great and small, the children and grand—children of his father's house, the meanest of them shall receive a lustre from their relation to him. All vessels—All sorts of vessels, great or small, mean or precious, may be hanged upon him, without any fear of falling.
